name: userWithId
description: Active for users with a userId defined in the userIds-list

name: applicationHostname
description: Active for client instances with a hostName in the hostNames-list.

parameters.name: hostNames
parameters.description: List of hostnames to enable the feature toggle for.

name: remoteAddress
description: Active for remote addresses defined in the IPs list.

parameters.name: IPs
parameters.description: List of IPs to enable the feature toggle for.
